name: Space Beards (Jakub Sawczuk)
description:
Team size: 4

Role: Programmer

Space Beards is a 2D action game in which the player controls a bouncing razorman attempting to survive an onslaught of missiles fired at him from the hands of a giant bearded space enemy. Use your bubble shield to defend against missiles and reflect projectiles back into the hands of your foe to defeat him before he defeats you.
